import React from 'react'; function StudentProfile({ selectedStudent, setSelectedStudent }) { async function deleteLesson(studentID) { try { const response = await axios({ method: 'DELETE', data: { id: studentID }, url: 'http://localhost:5000/lessons/delete', withCredentials: true, }); console.log('From Server:', response); setGetLessons(!getLessons); } catch (err) { console.log(err.response); } } return (
{selectedStudent ? (

{selectedStudent.name}

{selectedStudent.age} {selectedStudent.instrument}
Next Lesson: {selectedStudent.instrument}
Payment Status: {selectedStudent.instrument}
Contact Information
Primary Contact: Phone: Email: School:
Lesson Schedule
Primary Contact: Phone: Email: School:
) : ( No Student Selected )}
); } export default StudentProfile;
